blocks.title: Thank You Email Formats
blocks.content: It is important to display your manners and thank the individual that you interviewed with. Writing a thank you email allows you to stand out and increases your chances of getting hired. It is important that within your thank you email you emphasize your strengths once again. This is a chance for you to address why it is that you should be chosen to fill the open position. Don't be afraid to address some of the key skills you offer that would add value to their team. It is important to remember that you are only one individual who was interviewed, so sending a thank you email will boost your chances of employment and truly show how much you want then position. We recommend that interviewers send a thank you letter within 24 hours of interviewing.
